Description
3M Diamond Grade Conspicuity Marking Strip 983-32 (PN67635) Red/White, 2 in x 18 in, 100 per package

Highly reflective microprismatic sheeting in 2 inch x 18 inch strips with pressure sensitive adhesive for easy application to trucks, trailers and large vehicles to enhance visibility and detection distance. 11 inch red, 7 inch white.

Product ID: Diamond Grade 983-32 UPC: 00-051138-67635-3, 00051138676353 Stock ID: 75-0301-2364-2, 75030123642

Product ID : 983-32

Trademark Name 2 : Diamond Grade(TM)
Width : 2.0 Inch
Units per Pallet : 520 Package
